Welcome to this wonderful HTML page

This template is my best template yet.. With a simple & clean design, 6 modules and a ton of features, this can be a template for both studios and freelancers. Everything is customizable via xml(except the main fonts because in flash, the fonts need to be embedded), so you can really edit this without any Flash or Actionscript knowledge.

This is only the html module from the template. Please take your time to check all the features that this template has to offer.
This is html text, so this means that you can have bold text, italic text, underlined text, and even hyperlinks. This text field is automatically scrolling itself based on the position of your mouse. It can support images and swf files. Different colors, different sizes, and unordered lists:
